modName: Seasons Of Skyrim - Climate Overhauls - Summer Sounds
summary: Changes the wind sounds to more accommodating ones.
descriptionHtml:
This is a really simple mod for those who use Seasons Of Skyrim / Climate Overhauls - Summer Edition. I basically took out the wind sounds (which totally broke the new immersion) and changed them for each of the areas to more accommodating ones (birds, crickets, etc). This mod does not add new files to the game - its a simple edit of the already existing sound files.

Video:
[youtube]6E42U2r5-eI[/youtube]

To install this mod, simply copy the data folder to your Skyrim install folder.

To uninstall the mod, simply delete the added files.

Additional Notes:
This mod is fully compatible with the Sounds of Skyrim mods by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13821/?]Cliffworms[/url] (Credit to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6171081]benkar3[/url] for testing it out!)
This mod is fully compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57728/?]Climate Overhauls - Summer Winter Tropical[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5678513/?]AceeQ[/url] (and is recommended for the ideal "summer" experience)

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5678513/?]AceeQ[/url] - For making one of the best mods ever.
Bethesda - For making one of the best game series ever.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1891105]baangus[/url] - For making the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6069/?]Wind Begone[/url] - it helped me out a lot.
author: Inu11
